post.text: We are one nation. When one state hurts, we all hurt. We must all work together - to lift each other up. -DJT

comment.author: Alexandria
comment.text: When other Americans hurt we all hurt. Many people don't think about it, but it is true. So many people are so focused on getting ahead or doing what is best for themselves, that we now have a society that is controlled by selfishness and greed that is tearing this country apart. We were a country that loved freedom, liberty, and justice, but now we are a country that loves power and money. We are becoming like all other empires and countries before us. We will no longer be that country that is the burning light on the hill.

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: Bill Clinton lost the nuclear codes!! Joe Biden points to a man at a rally and says that he has the nuclear codes the other day!! And, Hillary exposed our National security in her private emails Vote for Trump he is Trustworthy

replies.author: Alexandria
replies.text: Cameron , I am voting for Trump in this election. I am usually independent because I can be slanted to one side or the other. I have issues I am conservative on and issues I am liberal on. I will never have my perfect candidate, so I choose the one that I think will be best.

replies.author: Bailey
replies.text: are you hurting when a mother looses her son to police violence, or are you looking for a record on him
